resources.string:
Sorry we couldn\'t find any vaccination center.
Try searching for some other area
1. You can search either by Pincode or by District
2. Age & vaccine filter None will show all available results
3. Press back button & select Yes from Search Results page to start background search
4. On selecting Yes, you can close the app. A notification would be sent when slots are available for current search parameter
5. For Xiaomi, OPPO & VIVO users, Please click on settings link below and enable autostart permission for background search to work properly

Sorry no background search scheduled.
Search for center to enable background search
